lote001.name: Lote 001 - Vacas Paridas con Crías
lote001.description: Premium lot consisting of 3 breeding cows with their calves: 2 male calves and 1 female calf. Daily milk production of 7 liters per cow. Located in Necoclí, Antioquia. Excellent breeding stock with proven genetics and healthy offspring. Perfect for expanding your herd with quality breeding stock.
lote001.shortDescription: 3 Vacas Paridas con 2 crías macho y 1 cría hembra. Producción 7 litros/día. Ubicación: Necoclí

collections.title: Cattle Collections
collections.subtitle: Discover premium cattle collections from Colombia's finest ranches
collections.underDevelopment: Our collections page is under development. Stay tuned for curated Web3 merchandise collections!
collections.tryAdjustingFilters: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria

vacasParidasCollection.name: Vacas Paridas
vacasParidasCollection.description: Premium breeding cows with proven fertility and excellent genetics. This collection features high-quality breeding stock with documented lineage, optimal health records, and superior maternal instincts. Perfect for serious cattle operations looking to expand their herd with premium bloodlines.
vacasParidasCollection.shortDescription: Premium breeding cows with proven genetics

vacasHorrasCollection.name: Vacas Horras
vacasHorrasCollection.description: Quality non-breeding cows perfect for meat production and commercial operations. This collection focuses on healthy, well-conformed cattle with excellent feed conversion rates and strong builds. Ideal for sustainable farming and efficient meat production.
vacasHorrasCollection.shortDescription: Quality non-breeding cows for meat production

novillasVientreCollection.name: Novillas de Vientre
novillasVientreCollection.description: Young pregnant heifers with excellent breeding potential and confirmed pregnancies. This collection features first-time mothers with strong genetic backgrounds and proper veterinary care. Perfect for expanding breeding operations with quality young stock.
novillasVientreCollection.shortDescription: Young pregnant heifers with breeding potential

hembrasLevanteCollection.name: Hembras de Levante
hembrasLevanteCollection.description: Young female cattle with excellent growth potential and strong constitution. This collection focuses on developing breeding stock and commercial females with good genetic backgrounds. Perfect for long-term herd development and sustainable farming.
hembrasLevanteCollection.shortDescription: Young female cattle with growth potential

machosLevanteCollection.name: Machos de Levante
machosLevanteCollection.description: Young male cattle with excellent potential for breeding and commercial production. This collection features strong, healthy males with good conformation and genetic backgrounds. Ideal for developing future breeding bulls and commercial operations.
machosLevanteCollection.shortDescription: Young male cattle with breeding potential

machosCebaCollection.name: Machos de Ceba
machosCebaCollection.description: Premium male cattle optimized for feedlot operations and meat production. This collection focuses on superior feed conversion rates, strong muscle development, and efficient weight gain. Perfect for profitable feedlot operations and quality meat production.

toretesCollection.name: Toretes
toretesCollection.description: Young bulls with excellent genetic potential and good conformation. This collection features promising young bulls perfect for developing into breeding stock or commercial production. Ideal for breeding programs and herd improvement initiatives.

torosCollection.name: Toros
torosCollection.description: Elite breeding bulls with proven genetics and exceptional breeding performance. This collection features top-quality bulls with outstanding health records, superior traits, and documented breeding success. Perfect for high-end breeding programs and genetic advancement.
torosCollection.shortDescription: Elite breeding bulls with proven genetics

about.title: About Digital Cattleman
about.subtitle: Leading the digital cattle revolution with innovative blockchain technology and sustainable ranching practices
about.underDevelopment: Our about page is under development. Learn more about Copoazú Labs and our mission soon!

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To bridge the gap between traditional cattle ranching and the decentralized future, creating a digital marketplace that empowers cattle ranchers and buyers worldwide. We believe in democratizing cattle trading through blockchain technology while maintaining the highest standards of quality and transparency.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Pushing boundaries with cutting-edge blockchain technology and sustainable ranching practices that set new industry standards.

community.title: Community
community.description: Building a global network of cattle ranchers and buyers who share our vision of decentralized, transparent cattle trading.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Committed to sustainable ranching practices and ethical treatment of animals throughout our entire supply chain.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Open and honest in all our operations, providing full visibility into our cattle's health records, genetics, and trading processes.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: The visionaries behind the digital cattle revolution
